_header: As I my self lay this ender night
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 194.
_description: On an unfaithful mistress — twelve quatrains

BodRawC813.Transcription:
As I my selfe lay thys enders nyghtall alone wuth owten any
                    fere……thys to yow I wryte and also sayeþat partyng ys
                    þe gronde of my woo
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 371-2.
Jansen,  Sharon L.,  and  Kathleen H. Jordan, eds.

         Binghamton, NY: Medieval & Renaissance Texts and Studies,
            1991: 211-13.
